review: Still a little buggy... I have to restart it by yanking the power now and then because it freezes up or inexplicably loses wifi connection. Sometimes it doesn't start streaming things when you select them from Netflix, Chrome tab, etc. Apple TV is better in terms of stability and not causing frustration. But when it does work (which is most of the time) it works well and has great picture quality. Recommended, especially for the price.
author: Narso

review: I love the Chromecast.  This is the third one I have purchased, two as gifts.  If you have a Netflix or similar subscription, then this is the way to go.  I like that I can simply unpug the device and take it to another room to watch.  Everyone who I know that has one enjoys it.
